messages.message: Hi Brian,I wanted to check with you if you would be interested in a Software Architect role at Dubai
can you please tell me how much you would be looking at?
they would give you a hike on what you are currently making
can you please let me know your current compensation?
Currently I'm make $120k per year, kind of hit the glass cieling.
they can give you around $135K annually
i have sent you an email on megamindbrian@gmail.com
please share a copy of your resume ASAP and also fill the questionnaire that is available there
Wife says they are too abusive to women.
that is not the case.they have their reservations which they can explain
Dubai is a bit different though.It is a bit more ultramodern as compared to the other parts of Middleeast

Lol, but compared to Switzerland? My wife is an entrepreneur too and women aren't allowed to run businesses there. Also not everyone want to wake up to morning prayer every day. I pray in the evening not at 4 am. You shouldn't be able to decide how much sleep everyone gets.
It's a double standard. Women don't uncover when they are in Europe, but every woman has to be covered in Dubai.
i agree to some extent what you are saying
would you be relocating alone or with your family?
I take me wife everywhere instead of leaving her at home in the kitchen like a slave.
